text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Define Konata’s general proportions. Draw her head and a line through her figure.
Add lines to the neck, hair and body of the girl.
Add guidelines for Konata’s arms, hands, feet and facial features.
Draw the shapes of Konata’s legs, feet, sleeves, eyebrows and eyes.
Sketch the hands, hair and clothes of the character. Add her irises.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Konata, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
